Introduction

Magarin is a South Korean model, influencer, Bj, champagne-girl, and dancer. She was a member of the South Korean girl group Fly With Me under FA Entertainment, with the stage name Garin. The nickname ‘Magarin’ is said to be derived from margarine rice, which was her father’s favorite meal when she was young.

She debuted as a member of the South Korean girl group FlyWithMe in September 2022 and she left the South Korean girl group, Fly With Me, sometime around July 2023.
